thread.title: BRIEF-Southwest Airlines Says It Is Accelerating Its Existing Engine Inspection Program Relating To CFM56 Engine Family

title: BRIEF-Southwest Airlines Says It Is Accelerating Its Existing Engine Inspection Program Relating To CFM56 Engine Family
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Southwest Airlines Co:
* SOUTHWEST AIRLINES HAS ANNOUNCED THAT IT IS ACCELERATING ITS EXISTING ENGINE INSPECTION PROGRAM RELATING TO THE CFM56 ENGINE FAMILY
* SOUTHWEST AIRLINES - ACCELERATED INSPECTIONS ARE BEING PERFORMED OUT OF AN ABUNDANCE OF CAUTION AND ARE EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED OVER THE NEXT 30 DAYS
* SOUTHWEST AIRLINES SAYS AIRLINE EXPECTS MINIMAL DISRUPTION TO THE OPERATION DURING THE COURSE OF THE INSPECTIONS Further company coverage:
